subject: NCAA Baseball Championships
Baseball
College World Series
lead_paragraph: Last weekend, for the first time since 1980, St. John’s advanced past the N.C.A.A. baseball tournament’s regional round, led by Jeremy Baltz, a second-round draft pick of the Padres.
snippet: Last weekend, for the first time since 1980, St. John’s advanced past the N.C.A.A. baseball tournament’s regional round, led by Jeremy Baltz, a second-round draft pick of the Padres.
